Neji leaps forward and strikes the opponent several times in the back before dashing in front of them. He strikes several more times until using an [[Eight Trigrams Palms Revolving Heaven]]-like strike to launch the opponent into the air. There, Neji strikes the opponent before several more times hitting them once more at light speed, blasting them into the air in a beam of chakra.

[[pl:Shin Hakke Rokujūyon Shō]]
